name: Hold In The P
description:
Made by : Van Tran

Game 1 for Session 3 Game Design

Instruction: (1Week)

make a quick prototype of a game inspired on something from real life and not video games on any engine and platform of your choosing.

Hint: always move forwards while pressing Q and P.

*Toilet Location: turn 180 degree, go straight, left and right to continue going straight. take a right and follow till you see the bathroom sign

This game was based on my small bladder at work.

If i ever have time i would like to add obstacles. People passing and starting conversation, objects or sounds that make you want to pee when you look at them different levels/ environment.
